ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionTiming__d.name: Communication Subscription Timing
ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionTiming__d.description: The Communication Subscription Timing DMO represents a customer's timing preferences for receiving a communication subscription.

ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionConsentId.description: A reference ID to preferences for one engagement channel on one communication subscription (channel) created by a care coordinator or patient.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Communication Subscription Timing DMO.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to system that External Record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__Offset__c.description: When a communication subscription occurs based on the unit of measure, for example, if UOM is "day of week" and offset is "1", communication subscriptions occur on Mondays.

ssot__PreferredEndTime__c.description: The user’s preferred end time to stop sending communications.

ssot__PreferredStartTime__c.description: The user’s preferred start time for sending communications.

ssot__PreferredTimeZoneId__c.description: A reference ID to range of longitudes where common standard time is used.

ssot__TimeUOM__c.description: A reference ID to unit of measure (time) used in communication subscription, for example hours or days.
